about.title: About me
about.intro: I'm Eric Sällström, a software developer residing in Dalarna, Sweden. Currently pursuing my studies in 'System Development .NET' at Edugrade. Other than my role as a dedicated and prospective developer, I find joy in activities like snowboarding and cross country skiing as well as spending time with family and friends.
about.as_a_developer: As a developer, I'm inquisitive, meticulous, and ambitious. I thrive on challenges, constantly seeking opportunities for learning and growth within the ever-evolving world of technology.
about.passions: Beyond the realm of system development, my passion lies with music, particularly in the facets of music production and mixing. In my spare time, I contribute to the operation of running a recording studio alongside my family. This venture not only adds another creative dimension to my life but also marks the point where my love for technology seamlessly converges with the world of music.
